org.freeplane.plugin.script.proxy

Interface Proxy.NodeStyleRO

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Proxy.NodeStyle
    Enclosing interface:
    Proxy

    public static interface Proxy.NodeStyleRO
    Node's style: node.style - read-only.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getStyle

        org.freeplane.features.styles.IStyle getStyle()

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns the name of the node's style if set or null otherwise. For styles with translated names the translation key is returned to make the process robust against language setting changes. It's guaranteed that node.style.name = node.style.name does not change the style.
        Since:
        1.2.2

      • getStyleNode

        Proxy.Node getStyleNode()

      • getBackgroundColor

        java.awt.Color getBackgroundColor()

      • getBackgroundColorCode

        java.lang.String getBackgroundColorCode()
        returns HTML color spec like #ff0000 (red) or #222222 (darkgray).
        Since:
        1.2

      • getEdge

      • isFloating

        boolean isFloating()
        Since:
        1.2 true if the floating style is set for the node (aka "free node").
